reviewText: Saw him do a seminar on deboning a deer. Bought the video and was not disappointed. Very informative.

I bought this dvd for a friend who is wants to start cutting his own deer. I thought I'd watch it to learn something from a professional meat cutter. I decided to keep this copy and get another for my buddy. I learned to cut from my parents and have been doing it over 30yrs. What a difference it makes to watch a pro do it. He does a very good job of showing and explaining. Im telling everyone that hunts that they should buy this dvd.

Great video on cutting your own deer after harvesting. Step by step guide makes it easy for a beginner or if you have been cutting your own for years, you may learn some new tricks to help you enjoy your venison to the fullest.

Most of the cutting is done on stainless countertops, which most hunters don't happen to have in their garages. I do most of my cuts while the animal is hanging by the hind legs. So not really for me. I have a large cutting board for cutting the quarters.
Easy to follow and understand. You will get a lot more meat out of your deer. I would highly recommend..
